title: Clear Roles
description: Our team has clearly defined roles. Roles and responsibilities match the skills and abilities of the team. Team members understand what is expected of them.

title: Process
description: We have a shared understanding of our process.

title: Experience in Software
description: Our team has previous experience delivering projects like this one.

title: Experts in Our Field
description: Our team has expertise in the subject matter of our product.

title: Clear, Shared Vision
description: There is a vision for this product and it has been clearly communicated. Team members have a shared understanding of what theyâ€™re trying to achieve.

title: Talent is Valued
description: Team members feel that the work they do is respected and their contributions to the work are valuable.

title: Challenge
description: Team members feel challenged by their work and think the work is important.

title: Debate and Decide Together
description: We are comfortable voicing our opinions, debating and deciding together on this team.

title: MVP
description: Our team has defined the smallest version that will provide value to users so that assumptions can be tested early and feedback incorporated into iterative builds.

title: UVP
description: Our team understands the unique attributes of this product that will satisfy a particular group of users such that they embrace this product over other options.

title: Metrics
description: We have defined success and we use quality metrics to drive product decisions.

title: Product/Market Fit
description: We are confident that our product delivers specific value tailored to our intended user group. In the case of a consumer product, we know that there are enough potential buyers for the product to be viable.
